channel.title: Nord Stream 2 on Baltic Security Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Nord Stream 2 on Baltic Security Foundation

item.title: U.S. Perspectives on Nord Stream 2
item.description: U.S. President Joe Biden has claimed that Nord Stream 2, the controversial Russo-German pipeline project, is a “bad deal for Europe” and has stated his administration’s opposition to the project.

item.title: Why Stopping Nord Stream 2 Matters for the Baltics
item.description: Nord Stream 2 is a Russian gas pipeline project running mostly parallel to the current Nord Stream pipeline from Vyborg to Greifswald, Germany.
